properties.entry: INSERT /* com.greedy.we.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#inserOneMember() */ INTO MEMBER A ( A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.MEMBER_NICKNAME , A.MEMBER_PHONE , A.MEMBER_EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT /* com.greedy.we.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptPwd() */ A.MEMBER_PWD FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.we.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NICKNAME , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PHONE , A.MEMBER_STATUS , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE , A.GUIDE_RANK FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ? AND A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE /* com.greedy.we.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#updateMember() 한미화 */ MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_NICKNAME = ? , A.MEMBER_PHONE = ? , A.MEMBER_EMAIL = ? WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.greedy.we.member.model.MemberDAO#delteMember() 한미화 */ MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.we.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMemberIdEmail() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NICKNAME , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PHONE , A.MEMBER_STATUS , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ? AND A.MEMBER_EMAIL= ? AND A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT /* com.greedy.we.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMemberIdEmail() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NICKNAME , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PHONE , A.MEMBER_STATUS , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_NICKNAME = ? AND A.MEMBER_EMAIL= ? AND A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE /* com.greedy.we.member.model.MemberDAO#pwdUpdate() 한미화 */ MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.greedy.we.member.model.MemberDAO#delteMember() 한미화 */ MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_ROLE = 'MEMBER' , A.GUIDE_RANK = 'NULL' WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NICKNAME , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PHONE , A.MEMBER_STATUS , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.we.member.model.MemberDAO#selectAllMemberList() 한미화 */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NICKNAME , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PHONE , A.MEMBER_STATUS , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT /* com.greedy.we.member.model.MemberDAO#selectNoMemberList() 한미화 */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NICKNAME , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PHONE , A.MEMBER_STATUS , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE GUIDE_INFORMATION A SET A.GUIDE_APPROVE = 'N' , A.GUIDE_STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_ROLE = 'MEMBER' , A.GUIDE_RANK = '0' WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_ROLE = 'MEMBER' , A.GUIDE_RANK = '0' WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.greedy.we.member.model.MemberDAO#resetPwd() 추지훈*/ MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ?
